## JdModalBeforeLeaveService.onBeforeLeaveConfirm() method

confirm 콜백. 반환값이 true 인 경우 닫음(뒤로가기), false 인 경우 닫기 취소.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
onBeforeLeaveConfirm(fn: CastFunction<boolean>): void;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | CastFunction&lt;boolean&gt; | 콜백 |
